message: Hi Bob, I have a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you for $15000.  Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in this product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $12000 for the product.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While $12000 is a good offer, I'm looking for a bit closer to my initial asking price.  How about we meet in the middle at $13500?  I'm confident this product will provide significant value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $12500 for the product.
